title: "The Truth About Owls" by Amal El-Mohtar
description: A young girl explores her own power, and finds kinship with a bird of prey. Find more from the author at amalelmohtar.com. Thanks to our presenting sponsor Audible. Start your free trial and get a free audiobook at audible.com/levar.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
